message: We remodeled the site navigation. Now you move around the site using the menu with your picture on it. Please let us know what you think, either here or via the on-site feedback tool.
You might also notice the new 'Designs' feature. This allows you to replace the 'vanilla' graphics with your face or a picture of your kittens.
(Please remember that you have to own the rights to any pictures or other graphics you upload to WingCash.com. Don't upload a Honda logo unless you are, in fact, Honda.)
